title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 401.1 - Comprehensive annual social services program plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 401.1 - Comprehensive annual social services program plan

State Regulations

The department shall prepare annually in accordance with
the requirements of title XX of the Federal Social Security Act a proposed and
a final services plan with Statewide applicability to be called the
"comprehensive annual social services program plan" under which a program of
social services shall be administered by the department and the social services
district under the supervision of the department. The proposed comprehensive
annual social services program plan shall be prepared by the department for
submission to and publication by the department and following a period of
public comment a final comprehensive annual social services program plan shall
be prepared by the department for submission to and publication by the Governor
incorporating changes, if any, from the proposed comprehensive annual social
services program plan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
401.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
